nav.div: Cocalico School District » District » COVID-19 (Coronavirus) Information

div.div:
Cocalico School District is committed to the health and safety of its students, staff, and the greater community. We continue to remain in contact with the PA Department of Health, the PA Department of Education, and the Centers for Disease Control (CDC). We also have continued communication with the Superintendents from all Lancaster County school districts and participate in regular statewide Superintendent briefings with officials from the Department of Health and the Department of Education.
At this time, Governor Wolf has closed all schools in Pennsylvania for the remainder of the school year. Cocalico School District remains committed to the educational growth of ALL students through the Continuity of Education Plan that was recently developed. Please click on the document in the left sidebar for details on the plan.
For more information, please refer to the links in the left sidebar. Here you will find additional resources about the illness as well as communications that we have already sent out districtwide to our parents and staff.
800 South 4th Street, PO Box 800, Denver, PA 17517 | Phone (717) 336-1413 | Fax (717) 336-1415
